casebody.data:
MCNA INSURANCE COMPANY, d/b/a MCNA Dental, Petitioner-Appellant,
v.
DEPARTMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, MANAGEMENT AND BUDGET, Respondent-Appellee. SC: 159173
COA: 342646 Supreme Court of Michigan. April 5, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for immediate consideration is GRANTED.

The application for leave to appeal the January 15, 2019 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
